SolusVM Control Panel Instant Set Up OpenVZ Virtualization 16 Core CPU Level 3 Premium Traffic High Bandwidth VPS hosting RAID-10 Enterprise Drive Systems Full Root Access 99.9% Network Uptime Branded Hardware Unlimited OS Reloads

Why IAmHostingAt.com?

1. IMH@ VPS nodes are built with enterprise-class servers connected to highly-redundant network with RAID 10 storage systems and minimum 16 core XEON CPUs.

2. Redundant, high-capacity, lightening fast network with 99.9% Availability Guaranteed and Multi GBit External Connection.

3. 24x7 support team working hard to make sure that the VPS performs the way you want it to perform (Management Optional).

DC Location : WebNX Los Angles, CA Test IP : 192.69.196.80
